name: Partners Group Private Equity
overview: Partners Group Private Equity is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in primary investments, secondary investments, direct investments, co-investments, replacements to already existing investors in the funds, private real estate and infrastructure investments, listed private equity investments, and private debt investments. The firm prefers to invest in Europe, North America and, Asia. In direct investments, it invests directly into operating companies and usually exits between two years and six years. Within private debt, the firm focuses on mezzanine debt direct investments and mezzanine debt funds. It focuses on primary, secondary and direct investments across geographic regions. Within primary investments, the firm focuses on mezzanine partnerships. In direct investments, it provides subordinated debt associated with leveraged buyout transactions. The firm invests across financing stages and geographic locations. It typically invests between $664,010 and $132.80 million in equity investment. The firm prefers to a take an advisory board seat in its portfolio companies. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Bear-Zug, Switzerland with additional offices across North America, Europe, and Asia. Partners Group Private Equity operates as a subsidiary of Partners Group.

funding_round.source_description: MobiApps Gets $10 Million Series B Funding From Intel Capital, UOB Management And Others
